thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Zisis Kerkides
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Zisis Kerkides

author: Zisis Kerkides
title: Zisis Kerkides
text: I've tried many companies, such as Gear Best, Everbuying, Tinydeal, but found Banggood to be the best, specially in terms of aftersales support. I have already conducted more than 30 buys and i am confident that even if the product fails in any way to meet its quality standards, banggood will gladly compensate for it. Highly recommended.
